001package io.github.ai4ci.abm.policy;
002
003import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutableOutbreakHistory;
004import io.github.ai4ci.abm.OutbreakState;
005import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.State;
006import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateMachineContext;
007import io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler;
008
009/**
010 * Called during an update cycle before any changes have been made This means
011 * any references to state refers to current state, but any references to
012 * history refer to the previous state. This overrrides the history update stage
013 * with a no-op as there is not really any testing or similar activity that
014 * takes place in the policy models.
015 */
016public interface PolicyModel extends State.PolicyState {
017
018        @Override
019        default public void updateHistory(
020                        ImmutableOutbreakHistory.Builder builder, OutbreakState person,
021                        StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
022        ) {}
023
024}
